items.name: Kawaisoup Plushie
items.description: A plushie of Kawaisoup! The scientifically proven most huggable soup there is!

items.name: Kawaisoup Body Pillow
items.description: A body pillow of Kawaisoup! ....Ya creep.

items.name: Revive Pearl
items.description: A shimmering remanent of powers long past, if in your inventory at the time of death will revive your character to full health without reseting the enemy monster's health!

items.name: Health Potion S
items.description: A potion that restores a portion of a characters health during battle without having to exit or die.

items.name: Shard Remnant
items.description: A shard that can be absorbed by your character to increase its exp.

items.name: Team hp replenish potion
items.description: A potion that heals 30 hp on all dmged characters

items.name: Underground Dungeon Key
items.description: A key used to access a dungeon in the Town Underground.

items.name: Desert Dungeon Key
items.description: A key used to access a dungeon in the scorching Dessert.

items.name: Soaring Dungeon Key
items.description: A key used to access a dungeon in the Flying City.

items.name: Crystal Tomb Key
items.description: Unknown.

items.name: Padoru Plushie
items.description: Exclusive 2019 christmas merchandise!

items.name: Champion's crystal
items.description: An item that allows for the changing of guild images to custom.

items.name: Rock-Encrusted Coin
items.description: A coin almost fossilized in nature, hinting to a long life underground...

items.name: Broken Excalibur Fragment
items.description: A piece of the broken blade Excalibur Morgan, may allow for a link through its reflective surface.

items.name: Warm spotted egg
items.description: A small, marble sized egg warm to the touch. Something resembling a heartbeat can be felt on the inside..

items.name: Cradle of Greed
items.description: A powerful item capable of granting a single deepest desire of its user, belonging to the world of Made in Abyss but found on alter.

items.name: Thought Cradle
items.description: 34YUQGW570F87S5409EM8484Q73=AW3V=-RECS=E4EVAZHDFUH

items.name: Meteorite Fragment
items.description: A piece of a meteorite that fell through the ozone layer.

items.name: Rayquaza Pet Voucher
items.description: Voucher

items.name: Event Character Voucher
items.description: Use for a free event character of garanteed glitch rarity.

passives.name: LifeSteal
passives.description: Restores 2 HP for every 10 hp dealt to the enemy.

passives.name: Sacrifice
passives.description: A character equipped with this item will damage themselves with attacks by 20 hp, but deal 20% more damage.

passives.name: Berserk Rage
passives.description: If the character drops below 100 Hp, remaining defenses are halved and attack/mattack is doubled.

passives.name: Opening Rage
passives.description: If the character has more than 200 Hp left, defenses are halved and attack/mattack is doubled.

passives.name: Cosmic Balance
passives.description: Nullifies all other passive items on the enemy, and character.

passives.name: Thief
passives.description: Takes the enemy passive effect and applies it to your character.

passives.name: Time Stop
passives.description: With every hit landed, you have a 10% chance to skip an enemy turn.

passives.name: Iron Will
passives.description: If a hit lands that would kill you, 50% chance to survive on 1 hp.

passives.name: Holy Blessing
passives.description: After each turn, recover 15 HP.

passives.name: Even Field
passives.description: If character stats total less than 400 (original), attack/mattack boosted by 50%.

passives.name: Reflection
passives.description: For every the enemy takes 25% of all damage dealt to you.

passives.name: Moxie
passives.description: After every sucessful hit, attack/mattack is boosted by 20% and defenses are lowered by 25%.

passives.name: Invisibility
passives.description: Increases the enemy miss chance by 30%.

passives.name: Longing
passives.description: Every turn, boosts 1 random stat by 25%, but decreases one by 25%

passives.name: Quick Draw
passives.description: Lowers the ultimate cooldown of the character 1 time.

passives.name: King's Charisma
passives.description: Boosts defenses by 20%.

passives.name: Damage Absorption
passives.description: If damage is taken, 25% chance to reduce by half.

passives.name: Offensive Force
passives.description: Boosts attack/mattack by 20%.

passives.name: Quickening
passives.description: Boosts speed by 20%, Lowers attack/mattack by 10%.

passives.name: Luck
passives.description: Increases critical hit rate, decreases miss rate.

passives.name: Reincarnation
passives.description: (For 3v3 || IF a character is killed, the next one chosen will have 30 bonus Hp.)

passives.name: Piercing Strikes
passives.description: Per attack, 50% chance to half the enemy's defenses for damage calculation.

plants.name: Purifying Mushrooms
plants.description: A kind of mushroom found deep underground, evolution has led it to suck toxic gas from the air and expell a pleasant scent.

plants.name: Charred Cactus
plants.description: A resilient cactus, able to survive even the strongest flames, legends say if held it will impart fire-resistance.

plants.name: Gentle Shrubbery
plants.description: A plain looking bush, however its soft-sumple leaves have a soothing effect.

plants.name: Transient Bamboo
plants.description: A plant that grows near sacred shrines and rivers, the transient bamboo is said to bring luck and fortune.

plants.name: Wilting Rose
plants.description: A single rose, found in the twilight.

plants.name: Fallen Cherry Blossom
plants.description: A single sakura flower, its petals falling off, its aura exudes that of a higher realm..

plants.name: Rising Palm
plants.description: A tall palm from lands far to the south, the milk of its coconuts is said to inspire courage in the drinker.

plants.name: Sunken Lily
plants.description: A lily said to boost resistance against curses, this flower was unfortunately lost to the depths.

plants.name: Bleeding Maple Tree
plants.description: A tree found near the flaming ground, its leaves are said to protect from fire.

plants.name: Soaring Dandelion
plants.description: A flower lost to its heavenly dreams, the soaring dandelion is said to guard from the reach of death.

plants.name: Unholy Petunia
plants.description: A flower left behind in the wake of the unholy spire, its true intent remains unknown.

plants.name: Crystal Harbinger
plants.description: A rock-like formation that inexplicably found its way into the shape of a flower.

catalysts.name: Tommy-gun Violin
catalysts.description: A gun used as a violin to trigger the holopsicon, holding sentimental value to the character Altair.

catalysts.name: Holopsicon Lance
catalysts.description: A powerful lance with ties to the cosmos, holding sentimental value to the character Sirius

catalysts.name: Scabbard Caliburn
catalysts.description: The sheath of excalibur, Caliburn offers healing properties. Holding sentimental value to the character Artoria

catalysts.name: Bell Chain
catalysts.description: Ringing bells that signal the arival of mischief, holding sentimental value to the character Magane

catalysts.name: Seed of Adam
catalysts.description: A part left over from the white giant that fell with the white moon. Holding powerful value to the character Eva 01

catalysts.name: Spear of Longinus
catalysts.description: Two original weapons used to seal away lilith of the black moon. Holding powerful value to the character of Eva 13

catalysts.name: Bloody Dagger
catalysts.description: The blade used to bring the mad emporer to his end, holding sentimental value to the character of Nero

catalysts.name: Worn Eyepatch
catalysts.description: Symbol of a young master with whom a vow was made. Holding sentimental value to the character Sebastion

catalysts.name: Stained Blindfold
catalysts.description: Belonging to a partner.. no, family. Holding sentimental value to the character 2B

catalysts.name: Burned Basket Piece
catalysts.description: The once home of a cute basket demon. Holding sentimental value to the character Nezuko

catalysts.name: Ring of Ainz Ooal Gown
catalysts.description: A guild ring allowing for passage through the great tomb. Holding sentimental value to the character Albedo

catalysts.name: Broken Snake Figure-head
catalysts.description: A broken off golden snake-head, holding in its mouth a dim cracked jewel. Holding Sentimental value to the character Ainz

catalysts.name: Empty Honey Pot
catalysts.description: A symbol of a budding friendship. Holding sentimental value to the character Milim Nava

catalysts.name: Tattered Scarf
catalysts.description: A first gift, a first love, endless loyalty. Holding Sentimental value to the character Mikasa

catalysts.name: Tattered combat maid outfit
catalysts.description: A powerful outfit meant to fit only those who will defend the great tomb of Nazarick

catalysts.name: Drill-bit Necklase
catalysts.description: A drill that will someday pierce the heavens

catalysts.name: Zero King Mask
catalysts.description: A king must be willing to lead on the frontlines
